title: Topic 004 Question 116
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure Key Vault Standard key vault named Vault1. Vault1 hosts a 2048-bit RSA key named key1.
You need to ensure that key1 is rotated every 90 days.
options: Modify the Access policies settings of Vault1.
Upgrade Vault1 to Key Vault Premium.
Recreate key1 as an EC key.
